Title: Apocalypse Child
Actors: Ana Abad Santos, Archie Alemania, RK Bagatsing, Annicka Dolonius
Plot: The film is set in surfing town of Baler where Ford who is wasting his youth away. Named after Francis Ford Coppola. As another surfing season is ending, he is forced to confront his past, including the myths and myths about his life.
